message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects that.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  I think you'll find that a very fair compromise.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
